title: Jadakiss | Ep 103 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Jadakiss | Ep 103 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Legendary rapper Jadakiss joins the guys on episode 103 of ALL THE SMOKE. Jadakiss opens up about his music career, his special bond with Biggie, leaving P Diddy's Bad Boy Records & the epic VERZUZ battle with Dipset. Plus, he shares the truth behind his beef with 50 Cent. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
